summary: In Hollywood it's all about who you know, and the only person two friends know is a serial killer.
cast: Arye Gross|Joe Pantoliano|Ron Perlman|Kristy Swanson|Tom Wood|John Considine|David Dukes|Nicole Hansen|Mark Neal|Nichole Pelerine|Rebecca Gray|Bryn Pryor|Ron Thomson|Hershey Felder|Saleem|Sean Healy|Hugo|Sean Casey|Ben Boyer|Trina Young|Heather Armstrong|Marla Cotovsky|Andrew Hamling|Kosta Rigapolus
title: Tinseltown
